reviews.review: Critics are out to lunch.  Give 90's to movies that don't deserve it and under score movies that do.  Well put together film.  I was definitely not disappointed.

As a huge marvel fan Infinty war kept its promise as always for its comedy,action and a little bit of drama .Though it all shocked us as Marvel put an end to a lot of superheroes even if it may be temporiy.
way better than Age of Ultron. Edge of the seat most of the time. Same depth as Winter Soldier. Fantastic Avengers flick
This is a very shocking movie, full of surprises, emotion and action. Marvel has done a great job on the first part of this two part movie and I can't wait to see what marvel has planed for part two!

Great movie, very well done. And even though the story is very bleak and involves the good guys taking numerous beatdowns, there is still a lot of good humor and good dialogue and character development. Why this movie has a Rotten Tomatoes aggregate of 84 while the Last Jedi was up in the 90s and was getting heaps of praise from almost every critic, just doesn't make sense. This movie is darker and much more bleak than The Last Jedi, but so much more enjoyable than The Last Jedi. The Last Jedi had uninteresting characters, uninteresting plot twists, bad dialogue, etc, etc. This movie, Infinity Wars, in comparison, offers such a much more exhilarating and interesting and exciting ride!
